verses.verse: But <S%G3588><s%> Him <S%G1161><s%> Being Weak <S%G770><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Receive <S%G4355><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Decisions <S%G1253><s%> Of Reasonings. <S%G1261><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> One <S%G3303><s%> Believes <S%G4100><s%> To Eat <S%G5315><s%> All Things; <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Another <S%G1161><s%> Being Weak <S%G770><s%> Herbs <S%G3001><s%> Eats. <S%G2068><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Eats, <S%G2068><s%> Him That <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Eats <S%G2068><s%> Let Him <S%G3361><s%> Not Despise; <S%G1848><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> He That <S%G3361><s%> Eats Not, <S%G2068><s%> Him That <S%G3588><s%> Eats <S%G2068><s%> Let Him <S%G3361><s%> Not Judge : <S%G2919><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Received. <S%G4355><s%>

Thou <S%G4771><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judging <S%G2919><s%> Another's <S%G245><s%> ; Servant? <S%G3610><s%> To His <S%G3588><s%> Own <S%G2398><s%> Master <S%G2962><s%> He Stands <S%G4739><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Falls. <S%G4098><s%> And He Shall Be Made <S%G2476><s%>, To Stand; <S%G1161><s%> Able <S%G1415><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To Make Stand <S%G2476><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> One <S%G3303><s%> Judges <S%G2919><s%> A Day <S%G2250><s%> ' To Be Above <S%G3844><s%>, <S%G2250><s%> A Day; <S%G3739><s%> Another <S%G1161><s%> Judges <S%G2919><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Day To Be Alike . <S%G2250><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> His <S%G3588><s%> Own <S%G2398><s%> Mind <S%G3563><s%> Let Be Fully Assured. <S%G4135><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Regards <S%G5426><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day, <S%G2250><s%> To The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Regards It; <S%G5426><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> He That <S%G3361><s%> Regards Not <S%G5426><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Day, <S%G2250><s%> To The Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Regards It Not. <S%G5426><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Eats, <S%G2068><s%> To The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Eats, <S%G2068><s%> He Gives Thanks <S%G2168><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Eats, <S%G2068><s%> To The Lord <S%G2962><s%> He <S%G3756><s%> Eats Not, <S%G2068><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gives Thanks <S%G2168><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>
No One <S%G3762><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Of Us <S%G2257><s%> To Himself <S%G1438><s%> Lives <S%G2198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> To Himself <S%G1438><s%> Dies. <S%G599><s%>

Both <S%G1437><s%> If <S%G5037><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> We Should Live <S%G2198><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> We Should Live; <S%G2198><s%> <S%G1437><s%> And If <S%G5037><s%> We Should Die, <S%G599><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> We Die : <S%G599><s%> Both <S%G1437><s%> If <S%G5037><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> We Should Live, <S%G2198><s%> And <S%G1437><s%> If <S%G5037><s%> We Should Die, <S%G599><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord's <S%G2962><s%> We Are. <S%G2070><s%>

For, <S%G1519><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Rose <S%G450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Lived Again, <S%G326><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Both The <S%G2532><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Living <S%G2198><s%> He Might Rule Over. <S%G2961><s%>

But <S%G4771><s%> Thou <S%G1161><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Judgest Thou <S%G2919><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> ; Thy? <S%G4675><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Dost Thou Despise <S%G1848><s%> Thy <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> ; Brother? <S%G4675><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> We Shall Stand Before <S%G3936><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judgment Seat <S%G968><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

It Has Been Written <S%G1125><s%>, For, <S%G1063><s%> Live <S%G2198><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Says The 3004 V-PAI-3S Lord, 2962 N-NSM That 3754 CONJ To Me 1698 P-1DS Shall Bow 2578 V-FAI-3S Every 3956 A-NSN Knee, 1119 N-NSN And 2532 CONJ Every 3956 A-NSF Tongue 1100 N-NSF Shall Confess 1843 V-FMI-3S To 3588 T-DSM God. 2316 N-DSM

So <S%G686><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> Of Us <S%G2257><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Account <S%G3056><s%> Shall Give <S%G1325><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

No Longer <S%G3371><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> Should We Judge; <S%G2919><s%> But <S%G235><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Judge Ye <S%G2919><s%> Rather, <S%G3123><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Put <S%G5087><s%> On Occasion Of Stumbling <S%G4348><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> A Cause Of Offence. <S%G4625><s%>

I Know <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Am Persuaded <S%G3982><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Nothing Is <S%G3762><s%> Unclean <S%G2839><s%> ' Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G1438><s%> Itself : <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> To Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Reckons <S%G3049><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> Unclean <S%G2839><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%> To That One <S%G1565><s%> Unclean It Is. <S%G2839><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> Meat <S%G1033><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> Is Grieved, <S%G3076><s%> No Longer <S%G3765><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Thou Walkest. <S%G4043><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> With <S%G3588><s%> Meat <S%G1033><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> Him <S%G1565><s%> Destroy <S%G622><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Died. <S%G599><s%>
Let Not <S%G3361><s%> Be Evil Spoken Of <S%G987><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Good; <S%G18><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Eating <S%G1035><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Drinking; <S%G4213><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy. <S%G40><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> These Things <S%G5125><s%> Serves <S%G1398><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Is Well Pleasing <S%G2101><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Approved <S%G1384><s%> <S%G3588><s%> By Men. <S%G444><s%>

So <S%G686><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Peace <S%G1515><s%> We Should Pursue, <S%G1377><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For Building Up <S%G3619><s%> <S%G3588><s%> One <S%G1519><s%> Another. <S%G240><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> For The Sake Of <S%G1752><s%> Meat <S%G1033><s%> Destroy <S%G2647><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Indeed Are <S%G3303><s%> Pure; <S%G2513><s%> But <S%G235><s%> It Is Evil <S%G2556><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Stumbling <S%G4348><s%> Eats. <S%G2068><s%>

It Is Right <S%G2570><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Eat <S%G5315><s%> Flesh, <S%G2907><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Drink <S%G4095><s%> Wine, <S%G3631><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Thy <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Brother <S%G4675><s%> Stumbles, <S%G4350><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Is Offended, <S%G4624><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Is Weak. <S%G770><s%>

Thou <S%G4771><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Hast? <S%G2192><s%> To <S%G2596><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> Have It <S%G2192><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Is He That <S%G3361><s%> Judges Not <S%G2919><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> He Approves. <S%G1381><s%>

But <S%G3588><s%> He That <S%G1161><s%> Doubts, <S%G1252><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> He Eat, <S%G5315><s%> Has Been Condemned, <S%G2632><s%> Because It Is <S%G3754><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Faith; <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G3956><s%> Everything <S%G1161><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is Not <S%G3756><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>
